entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -15.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swift Current Airport 2:48 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -15.6°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -18.9°C
Wind: S 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
